oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A view (looking west) along Church Street at Fourth Avenue N in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view (looking west) along Church Street at Fourth Avenue N in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, with some road repair construction. Several businesses and organizations in the central business district are depicted. Forms part of the Metro Archives Photographs - Streets Collection. 1 photograph.
